date.description: Specifies the date after which you want the corresponding action to take effect.

days.description: Specifies the number of days after object creation when the specific rule action takes effect.

storageClass.description: Specifies the Amazon S3 [storage class](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/API/API_Transition.html#AmazonS3-Type-Transition-StorageClass) to which you want the object to transition.
